name: Rotation Rodeo
description:
Toss some balls into the goals.

My first game jam experience! Created for Kenney Jam 2021.

I started a bit late, and did not manage my time as well as I needed to, so I didn't get to do a lot of things I would have liked. I totally whiffed on sound, which would have gone a long way towards achieving my missed goal of 'pinball/skeeball feel'.
